Pages.Name: math_counter
Pages.Description: Holds a numeric value and performs arithmetic operations upon it. If either the minimum or maximum legal value is nonzero, OutValue will be clamped to the legal range, and the OnHitMin/OnHitMax outputs will be fired at the appropriate times. If both min and max are set to zero, no clamping is performed and only the OutValue output will be fired.

Properties.Description: Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
Starting value for the counter.
Minimum legal value for the counter. If min=0 and max=0, no clamping is performed.
Maximum legal value for the counter. If min=0 and max=0, no clamping is performed.

InputOutputs.Name: Enable
InputOutputs.Description: Enable this entity.

InputOutputs.Name: Disable
InputOutputs.Description: Disable this entity.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.

InputOutputs.Name: Add
InputOutputs.Description: Add an amount to the counter and fire the OutValue output with the result.

InputOutputs.Name: Divide
InputOutputs.Description: Divide the counter by an amount and fire the OutValue output with the result.

InputOutputs.Name: Multiply
InputOutputs.Description: Multiply the counter by an amount and fire the OutValue output with the result.

InputOutputs.Name: SetValue
InputOutputs.Description: Set the counter to a new value and fire the OutValue output with the result.

InputOutputs.Name: SetValueNoFire
InputOutputs.Description: Set the counter to a new value without firing any outputs.

InputOutputs.Name: Subtract
InputOutputs.Description: Subtract an amount from the counter and fire the OutValue output with the result.

InputOutputs.Name: SetHitMax
InputOutputs.Description: Set the upper bound of the counter and fire the OutValue output with the current value.

InputOutputs.Name: SetHitMin
InputOutputs.Description: Set the lower bound of the counter and fire the OutValue output with the current value.

InputOutputs.Name: GetValue
InputOutputs.Description: Causes the counter fire its OnGetValue output with the current value of the counter. Used for polling the counter when you don't want constant updates from the OutValue output.

InputOutputs.Name: OutValue
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the counter value changes.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHitMin
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the counter value meets or goes below the min value. The counter must go back above the min value before the output will fire again.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHitMax
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the counter value meets or exceeds the max value. The counter must go below the max value before the output will fire again.

InputOutputs.Name: OnChangedFromMin
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the counter value changes from the minimum value.

InputOutputs.Name: OnChangedFromMax
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the counter value changes from the max value.

InputOutputs.Name: OnGetValue
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to the GetValue input. Used for polling the counter when you don't want constant updates from the OutValue output.
